title: The Population Size and Life Expectancy of countries in the GapMinder dataset
text:
This page will show the relationship between the population size and life expectancy of countries in the GapMinder dataset
import pandas as pd import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
gapminder = pd.read_csv(“/Users/keerthyrangan/Downloads/gapminder.csv”)
plt.axes() plt.scatter(x=gapminder[“life_expectancy”],y=gapminder[“population_millions”]) plt.title(“Life Expectancy and Population”)

title: The GDP and Life Expectancy of countries in the GapMinder dataset
text:
This page will show the relationship between the population size and life expectancy of countries in the GapMinder dataset
import pandas as pd import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
gapminder = pd.read_csv(“/Users/keerthyrangan/Downloads/gapminder.csv”)
plt.axes() plt.scatter(x=gapminder[“life_expectancy”],y=gapminder[“gdp_per_capita”]) plt.title(“Life Expectancy and Population”)

title: The GDP, Life Expectancy, and Population Size of countries in the GapMinder dataset
text:
This page will show the relationship between the GDP, life expectancy, and population size of countries in the GapMinder dataset
import pandas as pd import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import plotly.express as px gapminder = pd.read_csv(“/Users/keerthyrangan/Downloads/gapminder.csv”)
fig = px.scatter(x = gapminder[“gdp_per_capita”], y = gapminder[“life_expectancy”],size =gapminder[“population_millions”])
fig.show
